title: Trumpcast: Biden, Hope, and Vaccines
description:
Virginia Heffernan talks to Andy Slavitt, former Acting Administrator of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, about public health and how Joe Biden will handle the pandemic once he’s in office.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
